subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=屰<!--《六書正譌》、《字彙》：古戟字。-->,㦸,𢧢,⿰䈇戈,⿰⿱亠早戈,⿰𠦝⿱𠂉戈}}
{{zh-wp|zh:戟|en:Ji (polearm)}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Reduced form of {{zh-l|𢧢}}: {{Han compound|倝|戈|t1=[[branch]], reduction of {{zh-l|榦*}}|t2=weapon on pole|ls=ic}}.
